text.section: The Board of Trustees may designate not more than four companies, in addition to the company that was designated by a governing board of an employing institution on or before March 1, 1993, from which annuity contracts are to be purchased under the program.

section.section: The Board of Trustees shall approve the form and contents of annuity contracts to be offered by a company that is designated by the Board of Trustees under subsection (a) of this section.

The Board of Trustees may also approve the form and contents of additional types of annuity contracts to be offered for the first time after October 1, 1993, by the company designated by the governing board of an employing institution on or before March 1, 1993.
